title: WTB Von der Ahe (N284 and N172)
author: Fred

posts.post_title: WTB Von der Ahe (N284 and N172)
posts.post_content: Looking for N284 and/or N172 Von der Ahe.  Please send scans and prices to [url]COWLESF@AOL.COM[/url]

Thanks to those that emailed me the link to the $2500 SGC80 Von der Ahe on ebay.   I think the seller's price point is a bit optimistic on their part.  Seeing that an SGC20 (presents very nicely) recently sold on ebay for less than $220 recently, I think the price of the SGC80 is a bit "out there".  :p

Hi Fred,
I looked in one stash of mine and had no luck.
It is in the second one,and I will get the card this week!
Thanks,
Ben
